peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is plated silverware worth anything?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Silverplate flatware doesn't have a melt value like sterling silverware, and with a lower silver content, it is generally worth much less than sterling silver. However, more popular patterns have a following, and there are people searching for pieces they've lost over the years.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Selling Your Silverware - SilverSuperstore.com

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I know if my old silverware is valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Even if you can identify the purify and manufacturer of your pieces, the most valuable silverware sets will be those in pristine condition. To assess the overall condition of your flatware, check for any corrosion or polish loss.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Guide to Selling Silverware: Is My Silverware Worth Anything?

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Can you get money for silver-plated silverware?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: You could try selling it locally on FB marketplace or Craigslist as a jewelry crafting lot. Some people make jewelry out of old silver plate cutlery. You won't get much, but maybe 20-30 bucks from the right person.
